item.title: PFE
item.description: score:53 Chances: Pfizer’s work in developing new drugs and breaking into the obesity market shows potential for future growth and innovation. Pharmaceutical executives are plotting to break into the lucrative obesity market, indicating a potential opportunity for Pfizer to expand its product portfolio.
